timeline.bodyText: So if the expectedBir is an empty string, then the test case would pass here? Don't we have to fail that case?
timeline.author: Kishanthan

replies.bodyText: yes. The file is not in the folder. We test for files which are in the folder. For ...init or ...start or any such functions we chose to ignore there won't be a file for that. Then we ignore it. If the file is empty also it will ignore I guess.
replies.author: riyafa
